page.title: 04JOBS
page.content: ENGINEERING : The engineering side of the businesses at the Maltings,provide a reliable service for engines and motor parts. ELECTRICS : The businesses at the Maltings to do with electrics cover all range of electrical appliances from computers to fire alarms. LEISURE : At the Maltings, the businesses to do with leisure, provide equipment and leisure wear. DIY : The DIY businesses at the Maltings are mainly timber merchants and glass distributors. PHOTOGRAPHERS :There are a few photography businesses at the Maltings, which reprocess colour film. RETAIL : There are many retail businesses at the Maltings, including over 30 antique shops under one roof.
